newsitem.title: BOSNIA: Bosnia Feb output down 3.9 pct m/m, up 42.2 y/y.
newsitem.headline: Bosnia Feb output down 3.9 pct m/m, up 42.2 y/y.

text.p: The Statistics Bureau of Bosnia's Moslem-Croat federation issued the following economic indicator details on Monday.
BOSNIA INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION FEB JAN FEB 96

NOTES -- The data cover 51 percent of the territory of Bosnia-Hercegovina. No data are available for the Bosnian Serb republic. Bosnian industrial output was up 52.9 percent in Jan-Feb period compared to the same period in 1996. Feb 1997 production was down 88.2 percent compared to the prewar Feb 1991 output, the office said. -- Sarajevo newsroom, +387-71-663-864.
